runs.comm: that is some shot to open the innings! Full ball and Sibanda meets it with a perfectly straight bat and drives it past the bowler
Tanvir angles the ball across the right-hander from over the wicket, Sibanda lets it go
another full ball on leg and middle, driven towards mid-on
short of a length and straight, nudged off the back foot on the leg side
a good length ball cramps Sibanda for room and catches him on the crease, Sibanda defends
played towards deep midwicket
good length ball just outside off, Chibhabha cuts the ball hard into the ground towards point
tight line and length on middle stump, played from the crease towards midwicket
the batsman moves across and tries to play the ball through square, he misses and gets hit on the pad
loud appeal for lbw after Sibanda fails to connect with the flick, that was perhaps missing leg stump
full ball outside off stump, Sibanda has enough space to drive and he goes hard at it, lofting the ball flat over the infield
good length on middle and leg, Sibanda tries to play on the leg side but gets hit high on the pad
driven from the crease towards midwicket
shot! Sibanda goes down on one knee and lifts a full ball outside leg stump over the long-leg boundary, terrific hand-eye co-ordination, just used the bowler's pace
the short of a length ball hits him on the thigh pad
Sibanda tries to play that lift over long leg once again but doesn't make contact, the line was outside leg so Tanvir will have to bowl that again
Sibanda mis-times the pull but it lobs safely short of mid-on
defended on the front foot, Sibanda is out of his crease and turns around quickly to ensure the ball isn't going on to his stumps
full ball outside off stump, Sibanda steers it towards third man
Sibanda aims to hit the ball hard across the line but the length wasn't full enough, he gets hit on the pad but the ball was missing leg stump
that is a quick bouncer from Sohail, Sibanda sways out of the line of the ball
another short ball and Sibanda gets hit on the shoulder as he tries to pull, the ball goes towards third man
Chibhabha makes a little room by moving towards leg and drives a length ball on the up through cover, Malik gives chase but in vain
the batsman moves forward and nudges on the leg side
a slower ball on middle and leg, dabbed towards midwicket for a quick single

he's struck first ball. And that is some catch! Chibhabha decides to attack Ajmal right away and tries to loft him to the long-on boundary. He doesn't hit it well but manages to hit it over the inner circle. Yasir is at mid-on, though, and he runs back quickly and takes the catch over his right shoulder
defended on the back foot
a massive appeal for lbw and that looked plumb. The batsman tried to slog-sweep across the line and missed a straight one. It hit the back pad in line with the stumps. Plumb.
beaten outside off stump by the doosra
he tries to force the ball off the back foot and gets an inside edge on to the pad
defended on the front foot towards midwicket
another sharp short ball that takes off from short of a length, the batsman drops his wrists and lets it go
defended back to the bowler by Cephas Zhuwao. Now there's a terrific name
a slower ball to follow all those fast ones, pulled by Zhuwao, not very well but safely through square leg
the slower ball on a good length on off stump, Sibanda moves forward, plays it close on the off side and runs
short and wide outside off and Zhuwao goes up and over, carving the ball over point with a free swing of the arms
that's down leg side, the batsman can't connect with the flick
short of a length and Zhuwao pulls along the ground to deep square leg
played from the crease through cover
good length on leg stump, Sibanda moves across to try and hit behind square but misses. the ball hits the pad after pitching outside leg stump
Junaid angles the bouncer across the right-hander, the batsman lets it go

this was coming. Sibanda has looked increasingly restless and he tries to break free, attempting a big hit down the ground towards long on, he ends up slicing it high in the air towards point. Hafeez runs back and judges the catch well
the batsman gets hit on the pad while trying to push the ball on the leg side
the slower, short ball, the batsman doesn't time the pull well
full ball on off stump, the batsman edges towards point while trying to drive
Zhuwao tries to play the ball off the back foot but can't make contact
Zhuwao has room to cut and he makes good contact with the short ball, beating the fielder at point
now he tries to slog-sweep from outside off and gets beaten
bowled him! Hafeez fires it in straight and quick, homing in on off stump. Zhuwao gets down on one knee and tries to slog sweep once again. He misses and loses off stump.
played from the crease through the leg side
short of a length outside off, played off the back foot with an open face towards third man
another short ball, well-directed over off stump, Taylor tries to chip it over the keeper but makes no contact
played off the back foot towards backward point
this time he makes contact with the chip shot over the keeper and plays the short ball towards the third-man boundary
full toss driven to long off for one
Masakadza gets beaten by a short of a length ball that angles across him
Taylor leans forward and nudges towards midwicket
pushed off the front foot towards long-on, Zimbabwe reach 50
driven from the crease down the ground
Taylor defends on the leg side
played from the crease through midwicket for one more

that is the easiest caught and bowled ever taken. Masakadza plays too early, trying to push towards mid-on, and the leading edge lobs ever so tamely towards Hafeez, who takes two steps forward and catches it
the line is down leg side and Taylor pulls the ball past short fine leg, the fielder at deep backward square cuts it off though
played towards short third man
short ball and Taibu pulls hard off the back foot, splitting the gap between deep backward square leg and deep midwicket
defended on the back foot towards the off side
pushed off the front foot towards cover
cut off the back foot past point
Taibu makes room to cut Hafeez but the ball goes straight through outside off and beats the bat
defended on the leg side, Taibu wants one, Taylor doesn't
pushed towards long-on for a single
Zimbabwe continue to crumble. Taylor comes down the pitch and tries to chip the ball over the infield on the leg side. He only manages to lob the ball to Misbah at midwicket. Easy catch.
nudged off the front foot towards point
pushed off the front foot towards long on
Coventry makes room and gets a thick edge which flies quickly to Akmal's right, he gets gloves on it but can't hold on, the ball goes to the third man boundary
Coventry makes room once again and throws his bat at a length delivery outside off, he slices it over the infield to the backward point boundary

bowled him! Coventry wants a third boundary and so he backs away and tries to swat a short ball somewhere. He's in no position whatsoever and bottom-edges on to his stumps. Junaid gives him a send-off
good length and straight, defended on the off side
defended from the crease towards the off side, Junaid's bowling a tight length and angling the ball into the right-hander
short of a length outside off stump, guided towards third man
played off the front foot towards cover
fired down leg side, the batsman tries to reverse sweep and misses, Akmal also misses the ball
Chigumbura gets hit on the pad while trying to defend
that's too short outside off and Chigumbura blasts it over cover off the back foot, hammered it
driven to sweeper cover for a single
nudged off the front foot through midwicket
bowled flat through the air and straight, defended on the leg side. Maiden wicket in his first over, 11 in his second. Cricket ... leveller, and all that.
Junaid angles a full ball into the right-hander from round the wicket and hits the pad, the batsman was trying to play across the line. He might have got an inside edge
the yorker outside off stump beats the bat
full ball around off stump, Chigumbura makes room, clears his front foot and swings his bat hard, drilling the ball along the ground past the bowler
the slower ball outside off, played from the crease on the off side
short of a length outside off, Taibu tries to get on top of the bounce and guide towards third man but can't manage it
short of a length once again outside off, this time Taibu tries to cut but fails to connect
short ball outside off stump, forced off the back foot through covers and he's found the gap in the deep
played off the back foot towards cover point
played off the pads towards square leg
played to square leg once again
Ajmal strays down leg side and the batsman misses the glance
he tries to cut hard off the back foot but misses
flicked off the front foot through midwicket
slower ball outside off stump, played towards short third man with an open face
short ball down leg side, Taibu hooks and gets some bat on it towards the fine-leg boundary
this short one is well-directed, at Taibu's body, he gets cramped for room
short ball with width outside off stump, a touch slower it was but Chigumbura waited for it and slammed it with a flat bat over the head of the fielder at long-off
caught at long-on. Chigumbura tries to clear the boundary again but doesn't hit it well this time, he lofts the ball straight to Shafiq who is several yards inside the boundary
defended from the crease towards cover, they run a quick single
Taibu times the slog-sweep well but can't beat the fielder at deep square leg
defended back towards the bowler
he tries to guide the ball towards third man but is beaten by one that darts across him
Utseya tries to sweep but gets hit on the pad for a leg bye towards short third man
Utseya moves across towards the off to hit on the leg side but ends up defending in the end
defended off the back foot
Taibu moves his front foot out of the way and lofts Tanvir's length ball over mid-off, who is in the circle
full ball on middle stump, Taibu drives towards long-on and he loses the strike
a slower ball outside off stump, Utseya plays it towards point
Tanvir fires in a yorker, Taibu can only nudge on the leg side
a full toss on leg stump and the batsman hits it behind square
a low full toss on off and middle, pushed towards point for one more
what a shot this is, Taibu sits on the back foot, gets under a length ball and lofts it high and far over long-on. He hit that from in his crease, with front leg out of the way
Taibu almost did it! It was the short ball, a little slower, and Taibu heaved it into the gap between deep midwicket and long-on. The fielder from long-on ran to his right and saved two runs
full and straight, Taibu drives down the ground and Utseya hares back for the second
Taibu backs away to hit over cover but ends up slicing a short ball towards third man. Electric running once again and Taibu has the strike
short ball and Taibu pulls in the air towards deep square leg, there's a fielder in the deep but the ball falls short of him. Taibu comes back for the second

what an anticlimax that is. Sohail bowled a fast full toss a little more than a foot outside off stump. Taibu had backed away towards leg and eventually didn't play a shot. He was a bit too far away from the ball
